meaning_str.bing:
n. 名声；名誉
网络. 声誉；声望；信誉

名誉；声望；名声；知名度；声誉；信誉

1.en: The autumn equinox on Tuesday can elevate your reputation over the next month or so and encourage you to pursue your professional goals.
1.cn: 周二的秋分将提升你在下个月的声誉，激励你追求自己的职业目标。

2.en: Life is too short to risk your reputation, because sooner or later a bad reputation will catch up with you, and cost you dearly.
2.cn: 生命如此短暂，不能拿名誉来冒险，因为恶名会毁了你，并让你付出惨重的代价。

3.en: The prime minister has earned something of a reputation for grand gestures and promises with little follow-through.
3.cn: 故作姿态和华而不实的诺言已经为纳吉布首相赢得了些许名声。

0.en: Listen, I have a reputation for being completely hopeless at home but let me tell you I'm actually not that bad. But we'll be fine.
0.cn: 听着，我虽然有不会做家务的名声，但是告诉你我还没那么差。我们不会有事的。

1.en: I'm not gonna burn my reputation on your wild hunch. Thanks for coming, guys. Totally fucking awesome to see you.
1.cn: 我是不会为了你那点预感毁了我的名声的，多谢你们跑这一趟，兄弟，见到你们真是太好了。

2.en: Well, since you and your reputation obviously don't need me and my low-rent taste, you and the Waldorf name can weather the storm alone.
2.cn: 既然你和你声誉显然不需要我和我的俗气的品味，你和霍道夫的名声就独自面对吧。

3.en: I am looking forward to doing a few days of freelance legal work for my dad, because, where I work, I've gotten the unfair reputation of being the office nag, which is... See, it's only because I work with a bunch of slobs.
3.cn: 我很期待来给我爸做几天自由法律工作，因为在我上班的公司我有个不太公平的名声，"办公室里的唠叨鬼"，这... 那只是因为我跟一群懒汉一起工作。

4.en: It's my reputation at stake. I don't want to look foolhardy. Look, no one…
4.cn: 我要赌上声誉，我不想看起来有勇无谋。听着 没有人……

5.en: You just don't have the money or the reputation. Don't take it personally.
5.cn: 只是因为你们钱不够多，名不够响，别太当回事。

6.en: Geology? Yes. But we parted ways because I was worried about my reputation.
6.cn: 地质学吗？没错，但我们散伙了因为我担心自己的名誉受损。

7.en: You shot your reputation to hell a long time ago. It doesn't matter what you do, but I'm a Waldorf.
7.cn: 很久以前你就毁了你的声誉，没人在乎你干什么，但我是霍道夫。

8.en: I have a champion. Do you know Fang Zhen of the Red Lotus Society? By reputation. A peasant farmer.
8.cn: 我有王牌，你有没有听说过红莲教的方正？略有耳闻，他是个农夫。

9.en: Australia has a reputation as a land of creatures that bite, sting, and can even rip off your whole arm.
9.cn: 澳洲出名拥有不同种类的陆上生物，有咬人的，有带刺的，有的甚至可以扯下你整条手臂。

10.en: I called the department secretary to see what happened. Apparently, I have a reputation for being obnoxious.
10.cn: 我打电话问学院秘书是怎么回事，显然，全校的人都认为我很讨厌。

11.en: Our reputation is hanging by a thread as it is. Take it away from here, far away. Kill it. Dispose of it. Go!
11.cn: 到时餐厅声望就会像这只老鼠一样，把它弄走，愈远愈好，杀了它，处理掉，快点。

12.en: I was just saying, your reputation proceeds you, oh Smaug, the tyrannical. Truly, you have no equal on this earth.
12.cn: 您果然名不虚传，暴君斯矛革，您真的是无可比拟。

13.en: Well, because it's also about my reputation. And somehow you manage to hold your head high despite your checkered past.
13.cn: 因为这也跟我的名誉有关。而你虽然有着错综复杂的过去但现在仍保有谜之自信。

14.en: Yes. Si. Miguel. My reputation, it is very important to me. I would hate to have you think... That you murdered Hector for his songs?
14.cn: 对，啊，对，米格尔，我的名誉，它对我来说非常重要。你不会真的觉得我会... 您为了拿到埃克托的歌而杀了他吗？

15.en: Penny, this is serious. My reputation is on the line. What are people gonna think when they see us collaborating? I don't know. Poor Bert?
15.cn: 佩妮，事关重大。我的名誉悬于一线。其他人看到我们合作会怎么想啊？不知道呢，觉得伯特很可怜吧？

16.en: We live in a social world, where we do things as people favors as a part of reputation, the way we think of ourselves, the way they think of us is a social world.
16.cn: 一个具有社会性，我们需要做人们赞成的事，我们思考自己的方式，考虑别人的方式，这是社会性世界。

17.en: Once the news of his Alzheimer's gets out, which it will, because no matter how much we all try to lie about it, it's gonna leak, can you imagine what that's going to do to his reputation?
17.cn: 一旦他患病的消息泄露，这总会泄露的，因为无论我们怎么说谎隐瞒它，总会传出去，你能想象那对他的名誉会造成什么影响吗？

18.en: Unlike you, I don't have a rich husband. What I do have is a reputation for being a screw-up who never follows through on anything, which is why, in case you haven't noticed, I'm in my third year of a two-year college program and still living in my parent basement.
18.cn: 跟你不同，我没有有钱的老公，大家都觉得我什么事都会搞砸，什么事都坚持不下去，这就是为什么 如果你没留意到的话，两年的大学我已经读了第三年了，而且还住在父母的地下室里。
